*R/bindings.R*

## bind_table_data

## Description
 Bind table data 


## Usage
```r
 
bind_table_data(., data = NULL, columns = NULL) 
```

## Arguments
|Arguments|Description|
|---|---|
| . | The prior Flourish object. No need to specify name if piping graph as the graph will take the first argument (i.e. the prior existing graph). |
| data | Data frame |
| columns | A vector of column names |

 Other Flourish quizzes, surveys, and tables:  `bind_quiz_data()`, `bind_survey_data()`, `set_quiz_details()`, `set_survey_details()`, `set_table_details()`
